scripts.//: Fun fact! the '//' key in will never be used by npm and is reserved for commenting.
starknet-devnet isn't used yet because it doesn't support L1<>L2 messages yet
useful for catching syntax errors while developing
scripts.watch: (cd contracts && find . -name '*.cairo' | entr poetry run starknet-compile zorro.cairo)
scripts.//: caches test fixtures for use by the `test:use-cache` command
run tests using cache built by test:build-cache
use if tests have changed but contract code has not changed
scripts.test:use-cache: (cd contracts && poetry run pytest -n auto -s -W ignore::DeprecationWarning ../test/test.py)
scripts.//: for now, both development and production run on the goerli network
scripts.deploy: yarn compile && env CHAIN_DEPLOYMENT=development DEV_MODE=1 hardhat run ./scripts/deploy.ts --network goerli
scripts.deploy:production: yarn compile && env CHAIN_DEPLOYMENT=production hardhat run ./scripts/deploy.ts --network goerli
scripts.//: useful for generating a keypair to put in the `.env` file
